definition: The word "satt" refers to the state of being content or satisfied after having consumed a sufficient amount of food or drink. It is commonly used to describe the feeling of fullness or satiety, indicating that one has eaten enough and no longer feels hungry.

examples.german: Er isst, bis er satt ist.
examples.english: He eats until he is full.

examples.german: Ich habe genug gegessen und bin satt.
examples.english: I have eaten enough and I am full.

examples.german: Sie fühlt sich satt und zufrieden.
Nach dem großen Essen bin ich satt wie ein Stein.
examples.english: After the big meal, I am as full as a rock.
